summary:
ARE YOU LOOKING FOR SOMEONE WITH THE EXPERIENCE AND MOTIVATION TO MOVE YOUR BUSINESS IN ASIA TO THE NEXT LEVEL?

40+ years business experience with Hoechst AG (1979 to 1997 when acquired by Clariant), Clariant International Ltd. (1997 to 2010) and Evonik (2011- ) in various Divisions, Functions and Countries.

11+ years as General Manager with full scope of Operational Management (i.e. Production, Sourcing, SCM, Sales & Marketing, Site Services, Administration, EHSQ, HR, IT) 

7+ years in Finance, Accounting and Administration including HR, IT, Legal, SCM, Sourcing and Communications
 
7 years in Marketing and Sales

6 years in Controlling

5 years in Supply Chain Management

20 years in Executive Management positions in Asia, 

in China, (Rizhao, Shanghai, Chongqing, Yingkou, Hangzhou) as General Manager for 11+ years, 

South Korea, (Seoul) as Head of Finance and Administration for 3 years

Hong Kong as Head of Finance and Administration Greater China (P.R. China, Taiwan, Hong Kong) for 6.5 years.

As a seasoned manager with 20+ years of international executive management experience in Asia, incl. 12 years in China managing JV companies, I consider an Executive Management position or Top Management position in China or other countries. I strongly believe that a company will benefit from a person with my background and experience.  
I am also keen to explore possibilities in other industries including agriculture, automotive, consumer goods, electronics,  life science and pharmaceuticals, oil and gas and consultancies or NGO’s in China and / or Asia. 

Specialties: Specialist in several disciplines including Operational Management, Marketing and Sales, Finance and Administration, Costing and Controlling and HR. Confident leader and decision maker, specialist in project development and implementation with the ability to handle agreed budgets effectively. Proven track record in successful personnel management and target achievement even under difficult conditions.
